className.description: [Legacy] A custom class name for the component

email.description: Define the email to use (will check Gravatar for image).

initials.description: Define initials to display if there is no Gravatar image.

large.description: [Legacy] Enable a larger theme for the name.

size.description: Allow to setup size for the component

src.description: Import an image from a src url

theme.description: theme to detect which component should be rendered
